description:
use group4/Modules/07 NodeJS/Assignments/05.

create an Angular application.

implement a search form with one input field for text to search in the chat messages.

on submit, validate that the search term is at least 3 characters long

if it isn’t - show an error under the input field.

if it is - make an ajax call to the server.

when the results are returned, display a list with only 5 results, including the author and the chat message.

under the list show a button with the text “Load More” that, when clicked, will load and display the next 5 chat messages from the server. If there are no more results, the button should be disabled.
